About Us

AeroKLE is the centre for research and development in the field of UAV’s and Aerospace for igniting inquisitiveness and interests in the aerospace domain Initiated by likeminded Aerospace enthusiast students from different disciplines under mentorship of Dr. B.B. Kotturshettar curious enough to explore the sciences of defying gravity.

The team is an amalgamation of passionate students from different departments and years, a true multidisciplinary team, working towards design and development of ingenious and competitive UAVs

Our Subsystems

This subsystem is responsible for deciding over the materials used in plane by processing different layers of research and survey towards it and they also decide the basic dimensional and structural outframe of the plane

This subsystem is responsible for virtual analysis of design of plane and its individual parts which includes strength analysis, stress analysis, flow analysis and other CFD analysis

This subsystem decides over the power unit of the plane and also handles drones, data acquisition and processing and etc.

This subsystem validates the decisions of the team’s construction methods, structures etc. based on aerodynamic constructs

This subsystem is responsible for managing the team’s inventory, ensuring proper usage and restocking of required materials

This subsystem handles the teams yearly budget and is also responsible for funds approval and bill submissions etc.

click on a subsystem to know more about it
